title: OpenAI seeks Head of Preparedness to tackle AI risks
description: Sam Altman described the role as high-pressure, with immediate responsibility for handling complex safety challenges in AI development and deployment.

title: Prediction: This AI stock could be the first new $2 trillion company in 2026
description: Three companies are all neck-and-neck in the race to $2 trillion.The post Prediction: This AI stock could be the first new $2 trillion company in 2026 appeared first on The Motley Fool Australia.

title: Russia makes AI Christmas video with Trump getting gift and Zelensky in handcuffs
description: The video was posted ahead of a meeting between Trump and Zelensky on Sunday at the U.S. president's Mar-A-Lago club in Florida

title: Yonsei team deploys AI system to draft medical records at Severance
description: A research team at Yonsei University has built a generative AI-based medical record system that is now being used at Severance Hospital.

title: Sean Goedecke’s Cynical Lens on AI, Blockchain, and Tech Hype
description: Sean Goedecke's blog promotes a cynical lens on tech hype, urging scrutiny of AI, blockchain, and innovations to reveal hidden motives and societal costs. Drawing from industry experiences and media like NYT and X discussions, he advocates balanced skepticism for ethical progress. This approach fosters resilient, human-centered technology.
